about_the_game:
Play as Maria Romanoff on her last day of work at Monsty Corp

Monsty Corp is an advanced science facility in the middle of the Australian desert, Maria, a member of the Practical AI Division, has been tasked with activating a new AI. Little does she know, this is her last day on the job.

Uncover the secrets of the past!

Find out what happened before the events of Monsty Corp, and how it became what it is today.

content_descriptors.notes:
Monsty Corp the prequels contains, mature themes, frequent course language, gore, implied death and frequent violence.

It is NOT recommended for children.

name: Monsty Corp - The Prequels
